name: Don't Wake the Dragon (MajoMirez)
description:
You found the dragon's hoard! Mountains of gold and treasures within your reach, and you're free to loot everything your heart desires... as long as you follow just one simple rule: don't wake the dragon

Controls:

  • WASD: movement
  • Mouse: camera
  • E: loot treasure
  • Shift: Sprint
